thread.section_title: SecureDataRecovery.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SecureDataRecovery.com | securedatarecovery.com
thread.title: Arland Kane

author: Arland Kane
title: Arland Kane
text: Secure Data Recovery was able to recover all of my information off my failed hard drive, to my great relief. Alec Sakenes was fantastic to work with, and really helped me understand the timeline and pricing options, as well as making sure I understood each step of the process and answering all of the many questions I had with patience and enthusiasm. A great representative and great company, and would recommend to anyone.
